name: A Dicey Journey
description:
Sent to hell due to unfortunate circumstances. Now, our protagonist has to go on a dicey adventure to get out of hell and clear his internet history to save his dignity. TIME TO GET OUT OF HELL!

How to play:

WASD to move, Dices will change your speed depending on the number you land on. Green Dices will change your jump height.

A Dicey Journey was made by Clowns.  The challenge of the 2022 GMTK Game Jam was to make a game within 48 hours that fit the given theme "Roll of The Dice".
